DOC.brief_summary: Within this study patient data are collected from different imaging and motion monitoring devices that will be used to develop and test strategies for image-guided adaptive radiotherapy in cervix cancer patients.
DOC.brief_title: Image-guided Adaptive Radiotherapy for Cervix Cancer: Patient Image Acquisition
DOC.criteria: Histological diagnosis of cervix cancer Prescription of radiation treatment to the primary cancer Prior radiation treatment to the pelvis
